types:type.name: goods_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type goods_json = {| color: String, price: Number {"typeId": "double"}, name: String, id: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\"color\":\"black\",\"price\":85.0,\"name\":\"SWIFT RUN SHOES\",\"id\":1}"}

types:type.name: users_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type users_json = {| user_id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, surname: String, name: String, email: String |} {"example": "{\"user_id\":1,\"surname\":\"Yarmoshyk\",\"name\":\"Valentyn\",\"email\":\"vll1y@meta.ua\"}"}
